title: 86/441/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 June 1986 on the clearance of the accounts presented by the Hellenic Republic in respect of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, expenditure for 1982 (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 June 1986
on the clearance of the accounts presented by the Hellenic Republic in respect of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, expenditure for 1982
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(86/441/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The expenditure by the Hellenic Republic recognized as chargeable to the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, in respect of the 1982 financial year amounts, in accordance with the Annex, to Dr 36 430 369 938.
The financial resources available at the end of 1982 amount, in accordance with the Annex to Dr 8 808 777 955.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 17.
(3) OJ No L 186, 16. 8. 1972, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 131, 26. 5. 1977, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 125, 12. 5. 1984, p. 3.
